title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 704.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 704.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

This regulation applies to State oversight agencies as
defined in subdivision (4-a) of section
488
of the

Social Services Law, and facilities and provider agencies, as defined in
subdivision (4) of section
488
of the

Social Services Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
704.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
